title: #1507 From Highly Educated to Highly Indoctrinated
itunes:title: #1507 From Highly Educated to Highly Indoctrinated
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing pitching projects to people around Hollywood and how that has changed in the recent past as well as Dr. Drew's recent lethargy and what might be behind it. Drew also asks Adam for his thoughts on aging as it's a subject that he's been thinking about a lot lately. They then turn to the phones and speak to a caller with questions about vaccinating kids & the booster as well as a caller who has noticed a new 'disclaimer' phenomenon spreading across tv shows and movies. As the show wraps up they speak to a caller with questions about the variants and how they're being portrayed in the media.

Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
